name: Set Variables
func:
global.set("ctry",msg.payload.ctry)

global.set("adult_mor",msg.payload.adult_mor)
global.set("inf_deaths",msg.payload.inf_deaths)

var apikey="gHX4ABRU-VFFzwPyGUejEecXptY2IN0jnwv3eFMkIBNj";
msg.headers={"content-type":"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
msg.payload={"grant_type":"urn:ibm:params:oauth:grant-type:apikey","apikey":apikey}
return msg;
